body_html:
I'm not sure how this happened, but it sounds like a messed up installation.
Note that the conda packages are community supported (see https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_linux#use_pip_in_anaconda).

Could you use pip instead?
body_text:
I'm not sure how this happened, but it sounds like a messed up installation.
Note that the conda packages are community supported (see https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_linux#use_pip_in_anaconda).
Could you use pip instead?
body:
I'm not sure how this happened, but it sounds like a messed up installation.
Note that the `conda` packages are community supported (see https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_linux#use_pip_in_anaconda).

Could you use `pip` instead?
